sect2.title: Edit/New/Search
sect2.para: The default width for the content tables is 700px and should be maintained on all pages.

sect1.title: Images
sect1.para: The image format is png. The image size for the navigation icons is 22x22 pixels. All other icons are 16x16 pixels.
Images are named after their function. For example new.png or search.png.

sect1.title: Special CSS Definitions
sect1.para: All html pages in OTRS use a readymade CSS declaration that is part of every header. Should the style sheets not contain the needed declaration, additional sheets must be defined as an extra css block in the html source code instead of in an html element.
